name: DNA Climber (Unity build)
description:
DNA Climber is a student project game being developed at the University of the Sunshine Coast.

The game will teach university students the fundamental elements of DNA replication such as; DNA, RNA, replication, transcription, nucleotides, proteins, complementary base pairing and directionality.

DNA Climber is an endless runner designed to be played by university students on mobile devices as a way of supplementing their in-class workshop learning.
